overview: Paris By Night 78: Ðường Xưa (English Translation: The Path of the Past) is a Paris By Night program produced by Thúy Nga that was filmed at the Canadian Broadcasting Centre Studio #40 in Toronto, Canada on June 11th, 2005. The MC's were Nguyễn Ngọc Ngạn and Nguyễn Cao Kỳ Duyên.
title: Paris By Night 78: Ðường Xưa
